results.title: Targeting Aurora kinase B regulates cholesterol metabolism and enhances chemoimmunotherapy in cholangiocarcinoma.
results.text_hl: @GENE_AURKB @GENE_9212 @@@AURKB@@@ inhibitor or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can suppress @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@CCA@@@ progression and significantly enhance sensitivity to chemoimmunotherapy.

citations.NLM: Liu F, Chen W, Zhang Z, Zeng W, Hu H, Ning S, Liao Z, Liu Y, Zhang H, Fu Q, Zhang B, Chen X, Zhang W, Zhang Z. Targeting Aurora kinase B regulates cholesterol metabolism and enhances chemoimmunotherapy in cholangiocarcinoma. Gut. 2025 Jul 31;():. PMID: 40744724

results.title: Simvastatin stimulates apoptosis in cholangiocarcinoma by inhibition of Rac1 activity.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ stimulates apoptosis in @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@cholangiocarcinoma@@@ by inhibition of @GENE_RAC1 @GENE_5879 @@@Rac1@@@ activity.

results.title: Simvastatin and atorvastatin as inhibitors of proliferation and inducers of apoptosis in human cholangiocarcinoma cells.
